posts.post_title: T205 trade? Psa huggins for an sgc huggins
posts.post_content:
Hi All,

I have a PSA 4 Huggins Sweet Cap I would like to swap for a similar SGC 50 Huggins.  let me know if anyone has any interest.  send me an email.

thanks!

Cliff
